entry.title: Formula to replace actual version data to another version
entry.content:
Hello Team,

We have a requirement where we have to override actuals version data with user selected version for GL account with in a classic story, please help us if we can write any formula at story level or dimension level (not as data action through script)?

From the above screenshot, we would like to override actual value (-17331) of test account with Budget value (Null).

Thanks in advance.

entry.title: Partioning of table /BI0/F0SM_UPL_Y
entry.content:
which method is suitable for Partitioning  of table /BI0/F0SM_UPL_Y.  As we have house keep job has set and working fine. We kept 5 years retention as per the customer requirement and basic cleanup has been already.

current count is 1.5B. Could you please let me know which partitioning  is suitable for this log table and which key field i have to consider as we have many key fields in this table

entry.title: Update Member properties of SAC model via API
entry.content:
Dear Members ,

Our business requirement is to send details from SAC to SF , But we want to also update the member status of the data was send successfully to SF .

I am aware about the export API, Could you let me know if this is possible for we can update a member's details via an API from external middleware like SAP CPI?

entry.title: How to load prospective data using incremental feature
entry.content:
Hello,

In SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC), We are required to load the data in Classic Model which will be loaded for System date -3 i.e., if today is 17.07.2024 then system should load the data for 14.07.2024. Which will then should be based on incremental which means every day the date should get changed by default.
for example: on 18.07.2024 system should by default change the data load as 15.07.2024.

@N1kh1l , if you could please provide any inputs in achieving this.

Regards,
Tanya

entry.title: How to delete the leading zero in SAC Dimension from SAP Business Bydesign Datasource?
entry.content:
Hi Everyone,

Hello Everyone,

I'm working on integrating sales orders from an SAP Business ByDesign data source. When refreshing the dimension, data is coming in with leading zeros, even though I set the dimension to an integer in the modeler. Unfortunately, this isn’t trimming the leading zeros as expected. I also tried a script in stories to remove them, but I’m encountering errors. Does anyone know of another way to display the values without leading zeros?

If anyone has faced a similar issue, your advice would be appreciated!

 

Regards

Janarthanan

+919884594169

meetjana@hotmail.com

SAP Analytics Cloud

entry.title: Is there any way to sync an all-Page filter with an Input_Control filter?
entry.content:
I have a bar chart in Page 1. I want to select a dimension in the bar chart from Page 1 to filter whole of Page 2 using that value.

I'm able to do this, but the problem is that I already have an Input Control page filter on Page 2; the value of which is not changing because of the Page 1 filter. Is there any way to sync the All-Page / Story filter with an Input Control filter?

entry.title: How to show the Story Filter value in a Textbox in SAC?
entry.content:
I want to show the story filter value in a textbox. If 'All' is selected in the filter, then it should show 'All Business Units' otherwise it should show only the specific value that is selected. 

Currently what I did: I used a dynamic text & added that in the textbox. It shows 'All Business Units' when 'All' is selected in the filter, but if other options are selected (for example X or Y), then it is showing 'X Business Units' or 'Y Business Units' because the Business Units section is hardcoded in the textbox. I only want to show X or Y when the specific option is selected in the filter.

Is this possible to achieve? Kindly suggest if there's any way to achieve this!

entry.title: How to change a numeric value to a percentage value in a numeric point chart in SAC?
entry.content:
I have a numeric point chart which shows some value & this value is coming from a filter / input_control in SAC.

I want to use a button to switch between a numeric value & a percentage value in the chart. Is this possible to achieve? Kindly share solutions, if possible!

entry.title: SAC USER ID
entry.content:
Hi All,

What is the best option for USER ID in SAC?

I am planning to use the employee ID as the USER ID, but users who were created directly in IAS do not have an employee ID. Which attributes from Azure and IAS would be best to use as the USER ID in SAC?

Is the login name field in IAS always provisioned as the USER ID in SAC via IPS?

Thank you so much.

Best Regards

entry.title: Upload/copy paste to table level not to model in SAP SAC Story
entry.content:
Hi Experts!!

Here is the requirement!!

we want to copy paste from excel to SAC table /Story. While copy pasting it is taking time and performance is poor. is there any custom widget or solution to upload a file just to story table respecting filters not to model level.

Note:

1.Kindly don't recommend Upload starter , as our model has many dimensions to map, where user file doesn' t have , it has to pick up story/table level filters.

2. We have already pre-populated the data to initialize the combinations with zero's , as our data is a NON-SAP data at discrete level. (validation rules will not work as we have more than 8 dimensions)

using CSV or Excel file just upload data to story at table level only (Not via Upload/Import Jobs from model)

Model level /upload starter we tried , but we have to write custom logic to fetch other dimensions 

 

Thanks

Surya Harsha

 

@William_Yu1  

@N1kh1l

entry.title: SAC manual import and conenction with Live data
entry.content:
Hello,

 

I am reaching out to seek your advice on the best practices for importing manual data into SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC) on a monthly basis and subsequently joining this data with live SAP data connections. Specifically, I have a few questions that I would appreciate your insights on:

  1. Optimal Storage Path for Manual Data:

    • Could you recommend the most suitable storage path for the manual data? For instance, would using Google Drive or another cloud storage service be ideal for this purpose? I am looking for a solution that ensures easy access and integration with SAC.

  2. Best Medium for Automatic Data Integration:

    • What would be the best medium to automatically join the manual data with the live SAP data every month? The structure of the manual data will remain consistent, with only the values changing each month. I am interested in a method that minimizes manual intervention and ensures seamless integration.

  3. Monthly Data Refresh:

    • Both the manual data and the live SAP data will need to be refreshed once a month. Could you provide guidance on the most efficient way to set up this monthly refresh for both data sources within SAC?


#SAC #SACSTORY #SAP #SAPANALYTICAL

entry.title: How to Compare versions by selecting manually
entry.content: "I have four public versions: two are Forecast and two are Budget. I want to use two separate input controls, one to display only the Forecast versions, and another to display only the Budget versions. The user should be able to manually select one Forecast version and one Budget version from the respective input controls to compare between one forecast and one budget in a table."
